content: By generating a developer access token, you will be able to make API calls for your account without authorization. To obtain access tokens for other users, apply the standard OAuth flow.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message explaining the benefits of generating a developer access token, informing users that they will be able to make API calls without authorization. It appears in a modal dialog in the OAuth flow, guiding users on the purpose of this action.

usage.context:
<ModalDialog.Body>
 <StyledGenerateDevelopTokenContainer>
 {!token ? (
 <>
 <Text style={{ marginBottom: "16px" }} noSelect>
 {t("OAuth:GenerateTokenDescription")}
 </Text>
 <Text style={{ marginBottom: "16px" }} noSelect>
 {t("OAuth:GenerateTokenScope")}
 </Text>{" "}
 <Text noSelect>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "without authorization" is too literal and doesn't quite capture the intended meaning in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would convey the idea of calling APIs directly, bypassing the usual authentication process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tərtibatçı giriş tokeni yaratmaqla, hesabınız üçün adi təsdiqləməyə ehtiyac olmadan API zəngləri edə biləcəksiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "apply the standard OAuth flow" could be improved for clarity.  It's a bit technical and might not be readily understood by all users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Digər istifadəçilər üçün giriş tokenlərini əldə etmək üçün, standart OAuth prosedurına riayət edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "for your account" is translated as "за вашия профил". While technically correct, "профил" (profile) doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'account' in this context. 'Акаунт' would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Чрез генериране на токен за програмен достъп ще можете да правите API повиквания за вашия акаунт без разрешение.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translated sentence structure is slightly less fluent than the English. Although understandable, slight restructuring could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Чрез генериране на токен за програмен достъп, ще можете да правите API повиквания за вашия акаунт без разрешение. За да получите токени за достъп за други потребители, следвайте стандартния OAuth поток.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'By generating a developer access token' is somewhat awkwardly translated as 'Luomalla kehittäjän käyttöoikeustunnuksen'. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing would be 'Kehittäjän käyttöoikeustunnuksen luominen...' or 'Kun luot kehittäjän käyttöoikeustunnuksen...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kun luot kehittäjän käyttöoikeustunnuksen, voit...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'standard OAuth flow' is translated as 'tavallista OAuth-kulkua'. 'Kulkua' isn't the best fit here. 'OAuth-prosessi' or 'OAuth-työnkulku' would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: käytä normaalia OAuth-prosessia.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The hyphenated term 'մուտքի token-նները' is awkward. The correct Armenian would use a possessive particle.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մուտքի tokenները

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'զանգեր' (calls) is technically correct, but 'մուտքագրումներ' (entries/requests) might be more accurate in the context of API calls.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: API մուտքագրումներ կատարել

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'si' is awkward in this context. It implies an impersonal construction, but the sentence should be more direct addressing the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Generando un token di accesso per sviluppatori, potrai effettuare chiamate API per il tuo account senza autorizzazione.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'your account' is translated as 'proprio account'. While technically correct, 'tuo account' would be a more natural and common phrasing in Italian in this context, aligning with the 'you' in the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Generando un token di accesso per sviluppatori, potrai effettuare chiamate API per il tuo account senza autorizzazione. Per ottenere token di accesso per altri utenti, applicare il flusso OAuth standard.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'without authorization' is translated as '인증 없이'. While technically correct, it sounds unnatural in Korean. A more natural phrasing would be something like '인증 절차 없이' or '별도의 인증 없이'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 인증 절차 없이

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'To obtain access tokens for other users, apply the standard OAuth flow' is a bit abrupt. A smoother flow could be achieved by adding a connecting phrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 다른 사용자를 위한 액세스 토큰을 얻으려면 표준 OAuth 플로우를 사용하여 인증을 진행하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຕົວລະບຸໂຕ້ອນຮັບ" (torabu toerab) is a literal translation of 'token' and isn't commonly used in Lao when referring to an API access token. It sounds awkward and unclear.  'ຕົວລະບຸສິດ' (torabu sit) would be a more natural and understandable term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ຕົວລະບຸໂຕ້ອນຮັບ' with 'ຕົວລະບຸສິດ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “ກະແສມົນລະນະລັກການ” (krae monlalanalakkan) is a very formal and complicated way to say 'flow' or 'process' in this context.  It sounds overly technical for the intended audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ກະແສມົນລະນະລັກການ' with 'ວິທີການ' (witi kan) or 'ຂະບວນການ' (khapuan kan).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao text is missing spaces after punctuation marks, particularly periods. This affects readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add spaces after periods and other punctuation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "without authorization" is translated as "zonder autorisatie". While technically correct, it's stiff and could be improved for a more natural flow in Dutch. A more user-friendly phrasing would be 'without needing to authenticate' or 'without requiring authentication'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: zonder authenticatie te hoeven doen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a full stop (.) after 'stroom'. In Dutch, the convention is to use a period (punt) only at the end of a sentence, not after nouns. Although not strictly incorrect, it slightly disrupts the reading flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Om toegangstokens voor andere gebruikers te krijgen, past u de standaard OAuth flow toe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "developer access token" is awkwardly translated as "token dostępu dla programisty". While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing in Polish. A more appropriate translation would better convey the intended meaning of a token specific to developers.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: token dostępu deweloperskiego

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "make API calls" is translated as "wywoływać API". While understandable, using the Polish word for 'use' or 'access' would sound more natural.  "wykorzystywać API" or "dostępować do API" would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: wykorzystywać API

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'without authorization' is not the best translation of the English 'without authorization' in this context. It implies a lack of permission, which isn't the intended meaning. The English text implies the developer token allows access without the usual OAuth authorization prompt/flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ao gerar um token de acesso de desenvolvedor, você poderá fazer chamadas de API para sua conta sem precisar de autorização (como o fluxo OAuth usual).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'utilizadors' is a misspelling of 'utilizadores'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: utilizadores

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "authorization" is translated as "අවසරයකින් තොරව" which literally means "without permission". While understandable, a more accurate translation considering the context of OAuth might be "authentication" or "with a token".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "අවසරයකින් තොරව" with a phrase that better reflects the OAuth concept of authentication, such as "ප්‍රමාණවත් පරිත්‍යාගයකින්" or "ප්‍රමනීකරණයකින් තොරව" (though the latter is more technical).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "standard OAuth flow" is translated as "සම්මත OAuth ප්‍රවාහය".  "ප්‍රවාහය" is technically correct (meaning flow), but sounds slightly formal and less natural in this context. A slightly more accessible term could be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "සම්මත OAuth ප්‍රවාහය" with a simpler phrase like "සාමාන්‍ය OAuth ක්‍රියාවලිය" or "OAuth ක්‍රියාවලිය".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'By generating a developer access token' is a bit awkwardly translated as 'Po vygenerovaní tokenu prístupu pre vývojárov'. A more natural Slovak phrasing would clarify that the token is *for* the developer, not simply 'for developers'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po vygenerovaní prístupového tokenu pre vývojára...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'použite štandardný postup OAuth' is quite literal and could be improved for a more user-friendly tone. 'Apply the standard OAuth flow' implies a process to follow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Použite štandardný OAuth postup na získanie tokenov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "without authorization" is not accurately conveyed by "brez avtorizacije". A more appropriate translation would emphasize the concept of being able to make API calls *directly* without needing to go through the normal authentication process.  'Brez avtorizacije' implies a general lack of authorization, which isn't quite the meaning intended.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Boste lahko neposredno opravljali klice API-ja za svoj račun.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'API-ja' in the Slovenian translation is a shortened form. While acceptable, maintaining consistency with the English original (which doesn't shorten 'API') would create a more polished and potentially clearer translation for some readers. If the target audience is less familiar with technical jargon, 'API-ja' should be considered carefully.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Boste lahko brez avtorizacije opravljali klice API za svoj račun.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "токена за приступ програмера" is not the most natural way to say "developer access token" in Serbian. It's a literal translation that sounds awkward. The word 'programera' is also slightly off; it should likely be adjusted to better reflect the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like "токена за програмера" or "развојни токен за приступ".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Да бисте добили токене за приступ других корисника, примените стандардни OAuth ток." is grammatically correct but the word 'ток' is unusual after 'OAuth'. It should be 'OAuth ток' or 'OAuth процес'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'OAuth ток' to 'OAuth процес' or 'OAuth протокол'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'примените' (apply) doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'follow' or 'use' when talking about a flow like OAuth. It sounds more formal and less user-friendly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'примените' with 'користите' (use) or 'следите' (follow).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Generisanjem tokena za pristup programera" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "By generating a developer access token." "Generisanjem" implies creation, but "za pristup programera" is a bit clunky.  A better translation would be something like "Kreiranjem tokena za programere" or "Dobijanjem tokena za programere".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kreiranjem tokena za programere

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "OAuth tok" should be "OAuth tok proces" or "standardni OAuth tok". "Tok" on its own is incomplete.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: standardni OAuth tok proces

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, "Da biste dobili tokene za pristup drugih korisnika" can be improved for flow. The repetition of 'tokene za pristup' is a little heavy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Da biste dobili tokene za pristup drugim korisnicima, pratite standardni OAuth proces.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "yetkilendirme olmadan" (without authorization) is a literal translation of 'without authorization', but in this context, a more natural and clearer Turkish wording would be "yetkilendirme gerekmeksizin" or "yetkilendirme işlemi olmadan".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hesabınız için yetkilendirme gerekmeksizin/işlemi olmadan API çağrıları yapabileceksiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'tokenleri' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'erişim belirteçlerini'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Diğer kullanıcılar için erişim belirteçlerini almak için standart OAuth akışını uygulayın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "对您的帐户进行 API 调用" is a bit literal and awkward. A more natural phrasing would be something like "调用您的 API" or "访问您的 API". The original English uses 'make API calls for your account', which is broader than just 'calls'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 调用您的 API

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit stiff. While technically correct, it's not as fluent as it could be. '应用标准 OAuth 流程' is also a bit direct; a softer approach might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 要为其他用户获取访问令牌，请遵循标准的 OAuth 认证流程。
